item.title: Azure Monitor: Logs Ingestion API Tips & Tricks
item.description:
Hello followers and welcome back to this new post of mine
Today I am going to share with you an interesting experience in configuring the Logs ingestion using the new API in Azure Monitor in a data collection rule created using ARM templates.
In my previous HTTP Data Collector API in a real customer scenario post, I showed a possible use of th...
